content: Psalm 99[a]
The nations tremble.
He sits enthroned above the cherubim;
the earth shakes.
The  is elevated in Zion;
he is exalted over all the nations.
Let them praise your great and awesome name.
He is holy!
The king is strong;
he loves justice.
You ensure that legal decisions will be made fairly;
you promote justice and equity in Jacob.
Praise the  our God.
Worship before his footstool.
He is holy!
Moses and Aaron were among his priests;
Samuel was one of those who prayed to him.
They prayed to the  and he answered them.
He spoke to them from a pillar of cloud;
they obeyed his regulations and the ordinance he gave them.
O  our God, you answered them.
They found you to be a forgiving God,
but also one who punished their sinful deeds.
Praise the  our God!
Worship on his holy hill,
for the  our God is holy.
